name: Dodgeball Simulator VR
description: Unleash mayhem on the gymnasium as you throw your way to victory in this high impact, over the top, single-player, virtual reality dodgeball simulation.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Ready System Required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
